# How to change DNS settings on iOS

  1. Go to System Preferences and find Network

  1. Select your current network and click Advanced...

  1. Select DNS and remove the old ones

Then add DNS.SB's servers

185.222.222.222
45.11.45.11
2a09::
2a11::
  1. Click OK button
